## Acknowledgments

### Special Thanks

- To all the users who reported issues and suggested improvements
- To the open source community for inspiration and tools
- To everyone who helped test and validate the library

### Inspiration

This project was inspired by various temporal analysis tools and DSL implementations in the open source community.

## How to Get Added

Contributors are added to this file based on their contributions:

1. **Code Contributions**: Significant code changes or new features
2. **Documentation**: Major documentation improvements
3. **Issue Reporting**: Critical bug reports with detailed analysis
4. **Community Support**: Consistent help in discussions and issue triaging

To be added, please ensure your GitHub profile is properly linked in your commits.

## Contributor Stats

See the [GitHub Contributors](https://github.com/frasasu/zenith-analyser/graphs/contributors) page for detailed statistics.

## Contact

For questions about authorship or contributions, please open an issue or discussion on GitHub.
